titles.title: Brownfields Remediation Permanent Tax Incentive Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make the expensing of environmental remediation costs permanent law.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/20/2009--Introduced. Brownfields Remediation Permanent Tax Incentive Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the taxpayer election to expense (deduct in the current taxable year) expenditures for environmental remediation (i.e., abatement or control of hazardous substances at contaminated sites).
